articles.description: Marcus Rashford has been the poster boy for United since he burst into the team, but he is at greater risk than ever of leaving his boyhood club, writes Simon Stone.
articles.title: Man Utd & Marcus Rashford: What happens next?

articles.description: Oleksandr Usyk and Tyson Fury are taking different approaches to their rematch on Saturday, especially when it comes to their families.
articles.title: Fury vs Usyk 2: Oleksandr Usyk says 'I speak to family every day'

articles.description: India off-spinner Ravichandran Ashwin retires from international cricket as the seventh-highest Test wicket-taker of all time.
articles.title: Ravichandran Ashwin retires: India spinner quits international cricket at 38

articles.description: PGA Tour superstars Rory McIlroy and Scottie Scheffler show their superiority against LIV Golf rivals Bryson DeChambeau and Bryson Koepka in a floodlit exhibition in Las Vegas.
articles.title: The Showdown: Rory McIlroy & Scottie Scheffler beat Bryson DeChambeau & Brooks Koepka in PGA Tour-LIV Golf duel

articles.description: World Athletics will offer 25 athletes AI protection on some social media platforms after they were identified as highly targeted for abuse.
articles.title: World Athletics offers support to 25 athletes after social media abuse study

articles.description: Chelsea manager Enzo Maresca says the club "believe" Mykhailo Mudryk did not knowingly take a banned substance.
articles.title: Mykhailo Mudryk: Chelsea 'trust' winger after failed drugs test, says Enzo Maresca

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at why the NFL has moved away from the prospect of an overseas franchise or Super Bowl, to focus on staging more international games.
articles.title: NFL: How Mini Super Bowls & Christmas games can help league's international growth

articles.description: Across 17 Tests in 2024, England have veered from exhilarating to infuriating, often in the same session, writes Stephan Shemilt.
articles.title: England's Test year review: Heist of Hyderabad to a hiding in Hamilton

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at what adjustments Tyson Fury has made in preparing for Saturday's heavyweight rematch with Oleksandr Usyk.
articles.title: Fury vs Usyk 2: What adjustments must Briton make to win heavyweight rematch?

articles.description: BBC Sport takes a closer look at some of Liverpool's more subtle tactical tweaks since Arne Slot took over from Jurgen Klopp.
articles.title: Arne Slot: How Liverpool boss has changed Reds since Jurgen Klopp
